snippet: Among the books that have been acquired for Mr. Depp's new imprint, called Infinitum Nihil, are "The Unraveled Tales of Bob Dylan," and "House of Earth," a novel by Woody Guthrie.
abstract: Among the books that have been acquired for Mr. Depp's new imprint, called Infinitum Nihil, are "The Unraveled Tales of Bob Dylan," and "House of Earth," a novel by Woody Guthrie.

headline.main: Johnny Depp Starts New Literary Imprint at Harper
headline.print_headline: Johnny Depp Starts a Literary Imprint
